pair.title: Add Bluesound device
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the required fields.
pair.timeout: Timeout error: make sure you have entered the correct IP address and that your Bluesound is online.
pair.unknownerror: Unknown error, are you sure you have entered the correct IP address and Homey is on the same network as the Bluesound device? Please check your settings and try again.
pair.intro: Enter the IP address and port of your Bluesound device.
pair.testing: Bluesound connection test succesfull, you can now connect the Bluesound device.
pair.name: Device:
